Authors: Kristian H., Bunawan S.G., Wang G., Sfenrianto S.
Title: Social user behavior analysis of purchasing decisions in instagram online store
Source title: International Journal of Emerging Trends in Engineering Research
Affiliations: Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Kristian, H., Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Bunawan, S.G., Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wang, G., Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sfenrianto, S., Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The Instagram application is currently developing into a social commerce (s-commerce) in Indonesia, where many small and medium scale entrepreneurs use the application to sell their products. This study examines behaviors in individuals to the popular social networking site Instagram. The influence of social media behavior on purchasing decisions in e-commerce using the usefulness, perceived of use, social media behavior factors against intention to buy into the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) model theory. The results showed that the TAM model had a significant effect on the consumer's intention to purchase the product through the Instagram (Intention to Buy). © 2020, World Academy of Research in Science and Engineering. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Customer’s Behavior; Instagram; Social Media Marketing; TAM
References: Rini, H., (2007) Analisisfaktor-Faktor Yang Mempengaruhi Minat Pemanfaatan Sistem Informasi, , SNA X. UNHAS Makasar 26-28 Juli. Authors: Bunawan S.G., Aldenny M., Setiani D.I., Wang G.
Title: Architecture internet of things based on cluster housing security system using fog computing
Source title: International Journal of Advanced Trends in Computer Science and Engineering
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Bunawan, S.G., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Aldenny, M., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Setiani, D.I., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wang, G., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Internet of Things technology can help human work in information needs, utilize information, and provide information to the surrounding environment. One of the applications of IoT that helps humans with information gathering is control or monitoring activities that are controlled through commonly used devices. The use of IoT using the basis of the Fog Computing infrastructure provides a convenience to the function to control the use of electronic loads and security automation through remote control. © 2019, World Academy of Research in Science and Engineering. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Cloud Computing; Fog Computing; Intenet of Things; Smarthome
